Digital_Output_Digital_Output_State.title: Digital Output State
Digital_Output_Digital_Output_State.description: The current state of a digital output.

Digital_Output_Digital_Output_Polarity.title: Digital Output Polarity
Digital_Output_Digital_Output_Polarity.description: The polarity of the digital output as a Boolean (False = Normal, True = Reversed).

Digital_Output_Application_Type.title: Application Type
Digital_Output_Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.

Digital_Output_Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Digital_Output_Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.

Digital_Output_Fractional_Timestamp.title: Fractional Timestamp
Digital_Output_Fractional_Timestamp.description: Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).
